visualization_prompt: Generate a polar column chart showing Winter Olympic medal distribution by country using inverted layout with flag integration

title.text: Winter Olympic medals per existing country (TOP 5)

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains three-dimensional categorical data: 5 countries × 3 medal types × numerical counts. Synthetic medal counts maintain historical accuracy through realistic ordinal rankings (Norway > US > Germany) and proportional relationships between medal types (Gold ≈ Silver > Bronze). The polar column chart maximizes data-ink ratio by using angular position for countries and stacked bars for medal composition, while flag sprites leverage Cairo's pre-attentive processing for rapid country recognition. Medal totals (μ=97, σ=25.8 per country) follow Pareto distribution typical in sports achievements, with Norway's outlier position (Σ=368 medals) visually emphasized through radial extension.
